ygData.subject: Question on robots, canonical tag for nutch+heritrix
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello - I need to crawl my intranet site and visualize a links graph through subdomains in the intranet. I was trying to work with Nutch but faced two issues -

Hello -

I need to crawl my intranet site and visualize a links graph throu=
gh subdomains in the intranet.

I was trying to work with Nutch but faced t=
wo issues -

o   robots.txt was being ignored
o   Links were not deduped us=
ing their canonical link tag.

I would like to know if heritrix users face =
the above issues with heritrix.

Or if anybody has been able to get the abo=
ve issues resolved via nutch, could you please share your experiences.

Tha=
nks much,
